desc-with-translation.zh: Slider 向用户提供一种选择最小值和最大值之间值的方法。
desc-with-translation.en-ai: A Slider provides the user with a way to select a value between the minimum and maximum value.
Select the style for the area

desc-with-translation.zh: 除了通过拖拽和点击修改值以外，也可以直接修改 modelValue 的值来让滑块到指定位置。
desc-with-translation.en-ai: In addition to dragging and clicking to modify the value, you can also modify the modelValue directly to bring the slider to the specified position.

desc-with-translation.zh: 这里将 step 设置为 50，意味着 modelValue 一定为 step 的整数倍。
desc-with-translation.en-ai: Here, step is set to 50, which means that modelValue must be an integer multiple of step.
